victims.name: Albert Ojwang
victims.story: Killed during protests on June 25 near Parliament.

victims.name: Kevin Wekesa
victims.story: Abducted and later found deceased in Eldoret.

victims.name: Mary Atieno
victims.story: Killed while providing medical aid in Mombasa.

victims.name: Samuel Kipkoech
victims.story: Shot in the chest during demonstrations in Nakuru.

events.title: Parliament Breach
events.description: Protesters storm Parliament building in Nairobi.

events.title: First Nationwide Protest
events.description: Nationwide protests begin against tax hikes.

events.title: International Condemnation
events.description: Global human rights groups condemn government response.

events.title: 82 Abductions Reported
events.description: KNCHR reports at least 82 protest-related abductions.

events.title: Youth-Led Memorial Rallies
events.description: Youth groups organize peaceful memorial rallies across Kenya.
